devdoc.details: Uses minimal clone pattern for gas-efficient Assembly deployment

InsufficientBalance(uint256,uint256).details: The ETH balance of the account is not enough to perform the operation.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

params.factoryOwner: Address that will own the factory

returns.assemblyAddress: Address of the newly created Assembly

params.count: Number of recent Assemblies to return

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: AgoraFactory

assembliesByCreator(address,uint256).notice: Mapping from creator to their Assemblies

constructor.notice: Deploys the factory and implementation contracts

getAssembliesByCreator(address).notice: Get Assemblies created by a specific address

getAssembly(uint256).notice: Get Assembly address at specific index

getRecentAssemblies(uint256).notice: Get the most recently created Assemblies

isAssembly(address).notice: Mapping to verify if address is a valid Assembly from this factory

verifyAssembly(address).notice: Verify if an address is a valid Assembly from this factory

userdoc.notice: Factory contract for deploying new Assemblies
